resources.string: \t Mogok is a city in the Pyin Oo Lwin District of the Mandalay Region of Myanmar,located 200km north of Mandalay 148km north-east of Shwebo.Mogok was in Shan State and After British,the town was put in Mandalay Region alogn with Pyin Oo Lwin

\t At 1170 meters in elevation,the city has a fairly temperate cilimate year-round,and is home to Bamar,Shan ,Lisu,Palaung,and Karenn ethnic groups as well as Gurkhas,Indian and Chinese.The city is composed of two towns mMogok and KyatPyin .Mogok is four miles long nad two miles wide.it is situated in a valley surrounded by a large number of mountains ther are no mountains thsis is hilly area.Kyat pyin lies about 7 miles.

\t Mogok is a city in the Pyin Oo Lwin District of the Mandalay Region of Myanmar,located 200km north of Mandalay 148km north-east of Shwebo.Mogok was in Shan State and After British,the town was put in Mandalay Region alogn with Pyin Oo Lwin

...At 1170 meters in elevation,the city has a fairly temperate cilimate year-round,and is home to Bamar,Shan ,Lisu,Palaung,and Karenn ethnic groups as well as Gurkhas,Indian and Chinese.The city is composed of two towns mMogok and KyatPyin .Mogok is four miles long nad two miles wide.it is situated in a valley surrounded by a large number of mountains ther are no mountains thsis is hilly area.Kyat pyin lies about 7 miles.

\tThis application is intended for users who want to buy ticket easily and without going outdoor. Users can buy ticket easily because it categorizes according to their cities and respective car gates and there is also brief description about the respective arrival cities.
